divs: Sighting Detailsi work the 3rd shift ,and at 3:00am i was doing my rounds.i steped outside and was looking east.i observed a star like object appear about 1 inch from the morning star to its left,looking at it from my view.the object was stationary and grew in intensity and size,probably the size of a pea.the brightness got to a point of intense white light. (very bright)the star like object then diminished in size but stayed bright and then vanished.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Torrington
There were no other sightings in Torrington on or around December 9th 2007
Summary: looking east a exspanding star like object increased in brightness then dissapeared
